description:
Learn Effective defense against assailants with guns.

Muggings, hostage situations, handgun assaults.  Learn techniques to disarm the attacker and potentially save your life or the lives of others.

FEATURES: 
* Quick and simple instructional videos 
* Detailed explanations and demos 
* Developed by Military Grade Jiu Jitsu Expert 
* High quality video and audio


Learn life-savings tactics and techniques for defending against hand-gun threats, including: 

-Intro to Firearm Defense 
-Line of Fire vs Field of Fire 
-Important Tactical Training 
-Old School vs New School 
-Trained vs Untrained Gun Attacks - Frontal Gun Disarm Old School 
-Frontal Gun Disarm - New School 
-Frontal Gun Threat Disarm 2 - New School 
-Frontal Gun Threat Disarm 3 - Push/Pull Disarm 
-Frontal Gun Threat Disarm Variation - Bent Arm to Face 
-Counter Deployment Front 1 
-Counter Deployment Front 2 
-Counter Deployment Front 3 - If You Are Also Armed 
-Counter Deployment Side 1 
-Counter Deployment Side 2 - Vertical Wrist Lock 
-Counter Deployment Back 1 
-Counter Deployment With Hand Obstruction 
-Gun Struggle Disarm 
-Low Front Gun Threat Disarm 
-Low Front Gun Threat Disarm 2 
-Side Front Gun Threat Disarm 
-Back Gun Threat Disarm 1 
-Back Gun Threat Disarm Footwork 
-Back Gun Threat Disarm 2 
-Side Back Gun Threat Disarm 
-Hostage Situation Gun Disarm 
-Training Equipment Recommendations 
-Air Gun Reaction Training 1 
-Air Gun Reaction Training 2 
-Frontal Gun Threat Disarm From Inside 1 
-Frontal Gun Threat Disarm From Inside 3 
-Frontal Gun Threat Disarm From Inside 3
title: Self Defense from Gun Threats - Close Quarter Combat
